definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: It is showing no difference for basic concept of school mental - health education.
sentences.chinese: 中小学心理健康教育的基本概念众说纷纭，莫衷一是。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: Football has a good public basis and tradition in the prefectures of kashgar and kerkyz, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 足球运动在新疆中小学校具有良好的群众基础和传统。

sentences.english: This article focuses on primary and secondary school teachers to study the experience-based training evaluation model.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重研究了中小学教师体验式培训评估模型。

sentences.english: Students receiving special education include those learning in the same class of formal regular junior and primary school students.
sentences.chinese: 特殊教育学生数中包括普通中小学随班就读的学生。

sentences.english: 70% of basic and secondary students use online learning portals.
sentences.chinese: 70%的中小学生使用网上学习站点。

sentences.english: Adjustment of distribution of middle schools and primary schools in rural area has its specific behavior expectancy and power.
sentences.chinese: 农村中小学布局调整具有特定的行为预期和动力。

sentences.english: The numerous students with pink and blue raincoats made the view very magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 中小学生方阵里大家披着粉色和蓝色的雨衣格外壮观。

sentences.english: Free for individual primary and middle school student. (Visitor Ticket of Guangzhou Patriotism Education Base is required. )
sentences.chinese: 中小学生个人凭学生证按票价五折优惠。

sentences.english: Teaching and Research Group is an important component of China's primary and secondary school organizational structure.
sentences.chinese: 教研组是我国中小学组织架构中的一个重要构成部分。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xininng town and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良现况。

sentences.english: The main gist for Chinese course setup in primary and middle school is Country Course Program.
sentences.chinese: 中小学设置语文课程的主要依据是国家课程计划。

sentences.english: University-School partnerships in the U. S. have had a long history.
sentences.chinese: 美国大学与中小学合作具有悠久的历史。

sentences.english: The problem of the students? tiresome of learning in our country is also very common.
sentences.chinese: 我国中小学生厌学问题也十分突出。

sentences.english: Both her parents, now retired, worked for the school system.
sentences.chinese: 父母亲都在中小学教育系统工作，现已退休。

sentences.english: Some primary and middle schools have also been engaged in the experiments on the education of child prodigies.
sentences.chinese: 一些中小学也已经开始了针对天才儿童教育的试验。
